name: Crowdsurfing Simulator
description:
Crowdsurfing Simulator is an awesome local multiplayer game! You'll need 4 controllers to play.

Surf your metalhead through the crowd, and eliminate your friends by pushing them out of the zone! Be the last crowdsurfer alive!

Use the left stick of your controller to move your metalhead.

\m/.

Development notes:

- Thanks for Doğaç Yavuz for the soundtrack :D

- All code & art were done by Arda Çevik (except the font) on May 21st, 2015, at Komodor Pub, Kadıköy in 4 hours.

- Thanks.
